keyMoments.title: Sea Urchin Stinger
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger creates spikes all over her body in a sea urchin formation.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full combat capabilities of the Toge Toge no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Toge Toge Doping
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger enhances her physical abilities by growing spikes inside her body to stimulate muscles.
keyMoments.significance: Shows creative application of the fruit for self-enhancement.

keyMoments.title: Stinger Flail
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger transforms her arms into spiked flails for devastating area attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the offensive versatility of the Toge Toge no Mi.

abilitiesRevealed.description: User creates spikes all over their body in a defensive and offensive sea urchin formation.
User grows spikes inside their body to stimulate muscles, enhancing physical strength and speed.
User transforms their arms into spiked flails that can be swung wildly for area attacks.

description: The Toge Toge no Mi allows the user to grow spikes from any part of their body, including internally. This fruit provides both offensive and defensive capabilities, as well as the unique ability to enhance physical performance through internal spike growth.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 1's Steel Body
keyMoments.description: Zoro recognizes that Mr. 1's body is made of steel due to the Supa Supa no Mi, making him immune to conventional sword attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the challenge Zoro must overcome to defeat Mr. 1.

keyMoments.title: Spider Technique
keyMoments.description: Mr. 1 transforms his fingers into blades and attacks with the Spider technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Mr. 1 can transform any part of his body into blades.

abilitiesRevealed.description: User's entire body can become as hard as steel, making them immune to conventional cutting attacks.
User transforms their fingers into sharp blades for slashing attacks.

description: The Supa Supa no Mi allows the user to transform any part of their body into steel blades. The user's entire body becomes as hard as steel, providing both offensive blade attacks and defensive imperviousness to cutting damage.
